extension.summary: XBMC Online TV (a.k.a. XOT-Uzg.v3) is a plugin/script that allows the playback of a lot of TV shows that are available (legally) via the broadcasters websites.
extension.description: Set of MTV related channels for XBMC Online TV (MTV.nl, MTV.de, Southpark.nl).
extension.disclaimer: XBMC Online TV is provided as is. We do not take any responsibility for possible (but highly unlikely) damage cause to your system. Nor do we take responsibility for the content that can be watched via this add-on.
